original_text: And the fifth angel sounded, and I saw a star fall from heaven unto the earth: and to him was given the key of the bottomless pit.
korean_text: 다섯째 천사가 나팔을 불매 내가 보니 하늘에서 땅에 떨어진 별 하나가 있는데 그가 무저갱의 열쇠를 받았더라

sentences.original_text: and I saw a star fall from heaven
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 하늘에서 별 하나가 떨어지는 것을 보았으며

sentences.original_text: and to him was given the key
